issue.title: [CF 660] Check crowd control type.
issue.body:
Hello, I am French, sorry for my bad English.

It would be very useful to be able to check the type of crowd control like stun, snare, root, silence, disarm etc..

Thank you for your great work.


> Posted by CurseForge user Leblanco | Imported from CurseForge issue #660 | Raw

comments.body:
Why not just use the existing debuff equivalencies that exist for these?

Do you need help setting them up? Or were you not aware that they existed?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Going to close this ticket. If you still need help, please reply and I will be happy to reopen it and help you with whatever you need.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
